description: Knowledge exchange involves activities connecting policy makers and development practitioners within and cross countries to learn from each other`s experiences for the purpose of identifying, customizing, replicating, and/or scaling up workable development solutions and policies. These activities can include workshops, dialogues, expert visits, peer consultations, study tours, and twinning arrangements

name: LCR South South Knowledge Exchange Activities
